Uses of Class
adept.common.AdeptException

Packages that use AdeptException
adept.common Provides common data structures for use in the ADEPT framework, including the input Document and its TokenStream containing every Token, and the output HltContentContainer containing multiple kinds of annotations, such as EntityMention and Relation, which are based on the Chunk class. 
adept.data Provides interfaces for accessing databases and knowledge-bases such as NELL and the Paraphrase Database (PPDB). 
adept.module Provides interfaces and classes to support DEFT TA1 algorithm implementations in the ADEPT framework, primarily based on the AbstractModule class along with a set of Processor interfaces, which together support specific subclasses for analysis, extraction, tagging and other algorithms. 
 

Uses of AdeptException in adept.common
 

Subclasses of AdeptException in adept.common
 class SpeechDocumentCreationException
          SpeechDocumentCreationException e is thrown when a SpeechDocument cannot be created.
 class TextDocumentCreationException
          TextDocumentCreationException is thrown when a text document cannot be created.
 

Uses of AdeptException in adept.data
 

Subclasses of AdeptException in adept.data
 class AdeptDataException
          AdeptDataException is to handle exceptions pertaining to data.
 

Uses of AdeptException in adept.module
 

Subclasses of AdeptException in adept.module
 class AdeptModuleException
          AdeptModuleException is to handle exception in the modules.
